Text: How to use this? Please tell me! :)

Before i download it i just have one questions 
could you play a downloaded xbox game?
The other way around. The program emulates a pc on the xbox. I.e. you can play old dos games on a modded xbox.

Type:
    Games > XBOX360


but it said Xbox??
ok dude i need help, i download the link but when i open it it just shows up a list that asks me wat i want to open up the file with

Either this an emulator made for emulating the PC engine game system on your modded xbox console or its an emulator for DOS or x86 which is meant to run on the xbox. It is NOT a PC emulator that runs xbox games. Your all about about 3 - 5 years too early on that one. And you can run xbox games on your PC anyway without an emulator. It's called downloading the PC version of the game you want. Because I am pretty sure that 80% of the games that were released on xbox have been ported to PC
After looking at the torrent it's defiantly a PC Engine(TurboGrafx-16) emulator with a bunch of roms that is meant to run on a modded xbox.

Respuesta
ES PARA XBOX EL NORMAL NO 360

RESPUESTA
PC ENGINE TurboGrafx WITH ROMS
